attributes.title: Absolutely trash
attributes.review: The app constantly crashes and takes forever to   download don’t waste your time on this app

attributes.title: NO
attributes.review: This app is a disrespectful disappointing disgusting revolting terrible horrible gross icky bad nauseating experience. There is a man with a terrible spray tan and a clearly photoshopped face standing in front of an American flag even though he’s bringing this country to its knees 😭 I hate it

attributes.title: SOMETIMES I DONT WANNA BE HAPPY
attributes.review: when i opened the app i was playing minecraft and donald trump said to come to my house and the fbi came into my room🥴🥴 heart ❤️been broke 💔 so many times ⏰ i don’t 🤷‍♀️know what to believe 💭 yeah 👍 mama 👩🏾 said it’s my fault 👎🏿

attributes.title: Worst app ever used
attributes.review: They couldn’t even spell my name right this app was horrible I wish that I could literally give it zero stars and I don’t know why I downloaded it I hate Donald Trump

attributes.title: Horrible!! 🧿👄🧿
attributes.review: Right when I open up the app I was disgusted of the fat orange rat in the screen I screamed !! And the poor rat was so wrinkly he should get a doctor to check that out jeez!!😾anyways how y’all been ?😻😹😹😹😹

attributes.title: Do not download, it’s terrible
attributes.review: This app is honestly SO glitchy and horrible that I really don’t understand why it’s still on here. I’ve downloaded many apps in my life, but this is THE WORST.

attributes.title: The worst app ever
attributes.review: I downloaded the app to see what was about but my phone started to glitch because a giant Cheeto appeared and I got so scared I thought my phone got a virus I don’t recommend this app at allllll 🤢🤢🤮🤮🤮🤮

attributes.title: Not a good app at all
attributes.review: Very slow loading time, and just looks very poorly constructed should be taken down immediately

attributes.title: Leaves viruses on phone.
attributes.review: My phone started running SO slow after I downloaded this app. Ive tried everything. Still doesnt work.

attributes.title: Horrible app
attributes.review: This app kept crashing, pop up ads every two seconds. Leaked my personal information as well!  I would rate this 0 stars but it won’t let me. DONT GET THE APP!!! 😡😡😡😡
